channel.title: SFoL 16 - Return the Blue Dragon (Hosted by Wolfy and Co-Hosted by Ashe) - Day 2 16/16
channel.description:
The Unseen had won, taking over Castle Adiart. But now, the small remainder of the Blue Dragon is fighting to take it over again!
[color=deeppink] Welcome one and all to a game where this time, the informed minority is the Blue Dragon, trying to get their Kingdom back from the clutches of the Unseen. Credits to @Ashe for creating the idea for a potential gamemode for ToL if it was to be developed.[/color]
**Rules:**
* [color=deeppink] Days will last 96 hours (4 IRL days)[/color]
* [color=deeppink] Nights will last 48 hours (2 IRL days)[/color]
* [color=deeppink] Players must post content within 24 hours. If no content has been posted for that long, then that player will recieve a prod. Failing to respond within 24 hours after the prod (as some players may be in different timezones) will result the player in getting replaced[/color]
* [color=deeppink]Journals will be presented on death, but only updated ones[/color]
* [color=deeppink]Blue Dragon will have a night chat **only**[/color]
**The Changes:**
* [color=deeppink] The Unseen has become the uninformed majority[/color]
* [color=deeppink]Neutrals still spawn as usual[/color]
* [color=deeppink] Mastermind, Assassin and Sellsword will **NOT** spawn in the game[/color]
* [color=deeppink] The cap size for the Blue Dragon is 4[/color]
* [color=deeppink] If the Negotiator dies, the newest member will become the Negotiator. If the Negotiator dies and there is only the oldest Blue Dragon Killer, then they will become the new Negotiator[/color]
[color=deeppink] The Insurgent **cannot** be replaced[/color]
[color=deeppink] All conversions have unique abilities, except the Knight[/color]
The new classes: >## [color=steblue]The Negotiator[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Special**[/color] **Undercover Rebel (Passive)** - You will appear to be a Servant to investigators for the first three nights. **Busy (Passive)** - Immune to Occupation. **Persuade (Night)** - Persuade someone to join the Blue Dragon. - Infinite uses, 1 day cooldown.
>## [color=steblue]The Insurgent[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Vengeance (Day)** - Your attack will pierce night immunity tonight. - Gains 1 use for each dead member of the Blue Dragon. **Eliminate (Night)** - Kill a target player if they are a member of the Unseen. If they are a neutral, they will instead be occupied. You will know which happened. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
The BD converted Mercenary:
>## [color=steblue]The Soldier[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Defend (Night)** Protect a Blue Dragon player, giving them visitation immunity. - 3 uses. **Payback (Night)** Attack a player who voted a Blue Dragon player for treason. **Soldier's Special:** Attack any player. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
The converted Prince, guaranteed to spawn: >## [color=purple]The Kidnapper[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to imprison at night, Occupying the target (Bypasses Occupy Immunity). - Infinite uses. **Execute (Night)** - Kill the imprisoned player (Bypass Night Immunity). If you execute a member of the Unseen, you lose all your remaining executions. - 3 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Now, for the changed classes:
>## [color=steblue]The Butler[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Nightshade Wine (Day)** After 3 days you can poison the The King, causing him to die in two nights if not healed by a Physician. If the King is a member of the Blue Dragon, you will take your own life. - 1 use. **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. **Butler Special:** Get a player so drunk that they will be occupied again tomorrow night. - 1 use **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Servant[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Nightshade Wine (Day)** - After 3 days you can poison the The King, causing him to die in two nights if not healed by a Physician. If the King is a member of the Unseen, you will take your own life. - 1 use. **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. - Infinite uses. **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Illusion (Day)** - Cast an illusion in the court. The user of the ability will believe they used their ability on themselves (shocked). - 2 uses. **Ice Ward (Night)** - Freeze a player's room preventing anyone from visiting them. - 2 Uses **Court Wizard Special** All Blue Dragon members will still be able to visit the target encased in ice. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Sage[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Shock (Day)** - Shock the target player, causing them to target themselves today if they use their day abilty. - 2 uses. **Wall of Fire (Night)** - Summon a wall of fire at a player’s door, preventing everyone from visiting them. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Drunk[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied during the night. **Debauchery (Night)** - Get in a player’s way, causing them to target you. - Infinite uses. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy and get rid of your target’s night and occupy immunities for the night. - 2 uses. **Drunk's Special -** **Hangover (Night)** - Make a player unable to talk or vote for 24 hours (Prods given will not count. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Alcoholic[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Debauchery (Night)** - Get in a player’s way, causing them to target you. Does not work with conversion abilities. - Infinite uses. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy and get rid of your target's night and occupy immunities for the night. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Hunter **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Isolation (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Wolf Companion (Night)** - Summon a wolf to attack someone. They will die instantly, but if they are death immune they will instead bleed and die in one day unless healed. - Can only be used if you are the oldest Blue Dragon Killer. Infinite uses. **Spike Traps (Night)** - Set spiked traps in your home to hurt all intruders. If trapped, the visitors wills bleed and die in a day, if untreated. You will be immune to death. - 4 uses **Hunter's Special:** Visitors die instantly, piercing death immunity. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Poacher **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Retribution (Passive)** - If found guilty of treason, you will kill your accuser before your execution. **Isolation (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Bear Companion (Night)** - Summon a bear companion to maul a target player, making them bleed and die in one day unless healed. - 2 uses. **Spike Traps (Night)** - Set spiked traps in your home to hurt all intruders. If trapped, the visitors will bleed and die in a day, if untreated. You will be immune to death and conversion. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Knight[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Protection (Night)** - Protect the Blue Dragon faction at night, giving up your life to save theirs if needed. **Cold Steel (Night)** - Kill a target player. - Can only be used if you are the oldest Blue Dragon Killer. Infinite uses. **Frenzy (Night)** - Kill a target player. Bypasses night Immunity, Occupying, and healing. - 1 use. **This class does not have a special as Frenzy is essentially the Special** *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Enforcer[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] **Sacrifice (Night)** - Protect a player, giving your life to kill their attackers. - Infinite Uses **Cold Steel (Night)** - Kill a target player. If they are a member of the Unseen, you will die. - Unlimited uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Maid Spy (Day)** - Send a maid to spy on someone during the day. You will be able to hear whispers to and from them. - Infinite uses. **[Call to Arms Only]** **Manipulate (Day, Special)** - Choose who the person you used Order on will vote. - Infinite uses. **Crier (Night)** - Send for a crier to deliver a message to the court at the start of the next day. - Infinite uses. **Order (Night)** - Negate the votes of a target player the next day. They can't accuse anyone or vote tomorrow. **Call to Arms Effect:** The day after using this ability, you will gain **Manipulate**. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Observer[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Angry Bird (Day)**- You will be told the name of the next player to use a day ability - 2 uses **Follow (Night)** - Observe a player to see who visits them and who they visited at night. - Infinite uses. **Window Peek (Night)** - Reveal a player's faction. **Observor's Special:** Reveal their exact class - 1 use *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Nightwatch[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Follow (Night)** - Observe a player to see who visits them and who they visited at night. - Infinite uses. **Window Peek (Night)** - Reveal a player's faction. - 2 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Physician[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - Immune to *nightshade* poison, and all forms of bleed. **Drug (Night)** - Trick a player in believing that they were attacked and healed - 2 uses **Defile (Night)** - If the target player dies tonight, they will appear as a class of your own choice - 3 uses **[Physician's Special]** **Concentrated Nightshade (Night)** - Poison the target player with a concentrated dose of nightshade, causing them to die instantly. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Herbalist[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - Immune to *nightshade* poison, and all forms of bleed. **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and cures poison. - Infinite uses. **Exhume (Night)** - Choose a dead player, Privately identify the class that killed them. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Priest **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Consume Soul (Passive)** - You cannot be killed at night while you have at least one soul. You lose a soul upon being attacked. **Bind Soul (Day)** - Makes a player Immune to death tonight. - 1 use. **Unleash Souls (Night)** - Lose all your souls. You will be told the class of a random player for each soul you previously held. - Unlimited. **Soul Trap (Night)** - If the target player dies at any point after using this ability, you will collect their soul. - Infinite uses. **Priest's Special:** **Vessel (Night)** - Target dead Blue Dragon player will be able to use their night ability, and it won't be visible to the Nightwatch/Observer. - 1 use *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Soulcatcher **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] **Devoted (Passive)** - You are Immune to one attack on your life. **Call the Dead (Passive)** - Communicate with the dead at night. **Bind Soul (Day)** - Makes a player Immune to death tonight. - 1 use. **Reanimate (Night)** - Bring a dead Unseen player back to life. Each night they remain alive, a soul will be consumed. If you have no souls, or are converted, the player dies. You can target all players, but will only successfully revive Unseen members. They will be convert immune. - 1 use. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Princess[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. Dark Wisp (Night)** - The Blue Dragon will appear as normal Unseen members tonight - 2 uses **Bat Eyelashes (Night)** - Get a players class type. **Princess's Special** Get your target's exact class. -1 use *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Duchess[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Flirt (Night)** - Check to see what class type the selected player is. You will receive two results, one of which will be their real type, and one won't be. - Infinite uses. **Will-O-Wisp (Night)** - Uncage a wisp, lighting your room. If someone visits you at night, the player you selected will have your visitor(s) revealed to them - 3 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Psychic **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **Telepathy (Day)** - Telepathically send a message to everyone; they will not know who sent it. - 2 uses. **Misdirect (Day)** - Force a player to accuse another player of Treason. - 2 uses. **Mindwarp (Night)** - Your target will receive incorrect results from their abilities tonight - Infinate use **Link Fates (Night)** - Two target players will suffer the same negative effects tonight, except killing and conversion. **Psychic's Special** This includes killing. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Illusionist **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] **Telepathy (Day)** - Telepathically send a message to everyone; they will not know who sent it. - 2 uses. **Misdirect (Day)** - Force a player to accuse another player of Treason. - 2 uses. **Link Destinies (Night)** - Two target players will benefit from the same positive and negative effects other than killing and conversion tonight, like healing or occupation. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Sheriff[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Show Badge (Passive)** - The Kidnapper will think you are the Marshal if you are jailed. **Scout (Day)** - Have a scout to follow the target player. The next morning you will discover their faction. - 2 uses. **Stakeout (Night)** - You will stakeout a target player's room, finding out any visitors' factions. **Sherrif's Special** You will find out their exact classes. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Marshal[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Show Badge (Passive)** - The Kidnapper will know you are the Marshal if you are jailed. **Fact Checking (Day)** - Determine if a previously investigated player has been converted to the Blue Dragon since checking them. - 2 uses. **Expert Investigation (Night)** - Determine if a player is a member of the Blue Dragon faction. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=steblue]The Prince[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to imprison at night, Occupying the target (Bypasses Occupy Immunity). If you choose to imprison, you will not be able to talk with the rest of the Blue Dragon tonight. You instead talk with the imprisoned player- Infinite uses **Interrogate (Night)** - Interrogate your imprisoned player, finding out their class type. - Infinite uses. **[Prince's Special]** **Execute (Night)** - Execute your imprisoned player, bypassing night immunity. - 3 uses *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Classes that stay the same: - Aristocrat - All neutrals
Sign Ups:
1. **RedneckHipster** 2. **PokemonKidRyan** 3. **NuclearBurrito** 4. **techwolves** 5. **Methnor** 6. **Moleland** :crown: 7. **Hippolytus** 8. **Vulgard** 9. **Frostwolf103** 10. **Sam17z** 11. **orangeandblack5** 12. **Marluxion** 13. **PolikShadowbliss** 14. **Insanity** 15. **Strangle** 16. **Parfait**
Backups:
1. Noz 2. Dama 3. Captain Nerbins
Graveyard:
Night 0 - Wolfy (died to common cold).

item.title: SFoL 16 - Return the Blue Dragon (Hosted by Wolfy and Co-Hosted by Ashe) - Day 2 16/16
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
The FoL Team has decided to end SFoL16 early due to what we believe to be cheating between PKR and Wolfy. As you may have noticed, PKR’s ability to discover scum yesterday was strangely accurate. Unfortunately, the FoL Team has determined that this is most likely due to cheating.

For those who are not aware, PKR and Wolfy have a history of cheating in forum matches (mainly on other sites). This isn’t the first time a forum game has been ended early due to collaborative cheating between the two. This is one of the main reasons that the FoL Team was initially sceptical. Combining that with the fact that Wolfy is the host of this game, and that PKR was able to with perfect accuracy know the entire Blue Dragon’s members (and their exact classes) and which player was the Neutral Killer, all on Day 2, we believe it is extremely likely that cheating has occured in this game.

While it is possible to either be in a situation where a player would have in-game knowledge to make these assumptions with the confidence that PKR did, or one where someone’s scum reads are lucky enough to be as incredibly accurate as PKR’s were, the FoL team believes that neither of these situations has occured. In PKR’s case, no justification or reasoning was provided for how or why PKR achieved these reads when he did, only later giving some justification that the FoL Team believes is not sufficient explanation on how he went about achieving these scum reads. Additionally, PKR was the Kidnapper in this game, and initially was going to imprison Marluxion (The Negotiator) on Night 1, before he changed to imprison a different player. Strangely, he provided his imprisonment choice with a screenshot of a random number generator, saying he only chose Marl because he had Marl as 4, and it landed on 4. I would not have been suspicious about a lucky imprisonment on it’s own, but the fact that he attempted to justify his imprisonment choice with a random number generator led me to believe that he had already gained knowledge of who the Negotiator was at the time, and wanted to “throw me off the trail” that he had the knowledge, when in fact this worked in reverse and led me to be suspicious of the choice.

While there is no definitive proof that PKR and Wolfy cheated in this game, the fact that all of the above happened in the same game that Wolfy hosted, as well as the fact that it isn’t the first time that a situation very similar to this has happened due to them means that this game is being ended early.

Edit: If you wish to discuss this, please do it on the FoL Discord server (Here’s the link if you aren’t a member of it already).

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 16 - Return the Blue Dragon (Hosted by Wolfy and Co-Hosted by Ashe) - Day 2 16/16

item.title: SFoL 16 - Return the Blue Dragon (Hosted by Wolfy and Co-Hosted by Ashe) - Day 2 16/16
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
The King looked upon his loyal subjects. They were furious that people had infiltrated their beloved Kingdom. He heard the shouts of executes, and guilties. He eventually stood up, and the court fell silent. “I have decided to find the accussed… GUILTY!”

The crowd cheered as Orange was tied to the stake, and was burnt. Once the execution finished, everyone went back to their rooms, hoping nothing would happen to anyone else.

Orange was executed. He was…

The Knight

The sun has set and is now night time. Night 2 ends Thursday 1st March 20:50 GMT. Sleep well my friends…

Read full topic

item.description:
@strangle, you have said nothing this day. Since it could be close to EOD, you do not need to worry about responding to the prod. However, when the next day begins, I will remind you that you need to post content, or you shall be replaced. You will receive a secondary prod if the day begins to continues you that you still have this to do.
